means: 放弃信仰的，脱党的，变节的

sentence.Network_en: The most furious anarchist become the most barefaced apostate.
sentence.Network_cn: 最激烈的无政府主义者,居然成了最露骨的变节者.

sentence.Network_en: I'm awfully glad you have made an apostate of me all the same!
sentence.Network_cn: 你虽然让我离经叛道,我还是一样地乐不可支!

sentence.Network_en: Extremes meet . the most furious anarchist become the most barefaced apostate.
sentence.Network_cn: 两极相通. 最激烈的无政府主义者,居然成了最露骨的变节者.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... apostasy n 背教；变节 apostate n 变节者 obstinate a 顽固的.
【最新】GRE单词(红宝书)TXT完全版 - 豆丁网 ... apostasy n. 背教，脱党 apostate n. 背教者；变节者 apostrophe n. 书写中撇号.
凯恩之怒单位语音翻译... ... Malice and pain malice- 恶毒，预谋 Apostate 叛教者 The hand becomes the fist 手握成拳.
无法区分堕落（corrupt）教会和背道（apostate）教会的区别，认为现在的福音

list.abs: And you apost know if it will be your last ., 你无从知道这是否是最后时刻.
Babylon is an apostate city frequently mentioned in the Old Testament ., 巴比伦是一个经常在旧约提到的背叛之城.
and you apost know if it will be your last .你无从知道这是否是最后时刻。
The most furious anarchist become the most barefaced apostate ., 最激烈的无政府主义者 , 居然成了最露骨的变节者.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from ecclesiastical Latin apostata, from Greek apostatēs 'apostate, runaway slave'

entry.def: An apostate is someone who has abandoned their religious faith, political loyalties, or principles.

means.word_mean: 1. a disloyal person who betrays or deserts his cause or religion or political party or friend etc.
1. not faithful to religion or party or cause

stems_affixes.word_buile: station位置,岗位+ary……的→adj.静止的,固定的
apo离开+stat站,立+e→n.背教者,变节者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 房地产;不动产;所有权;地位;生活状况
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+stat站,立+e→站出来的东西→房子等不动产
state陈述,说明+ment表名词→n.声明,陈述
stat站,立+ion表名词→立着不动→位置,岗位
stat站,立+istic学科+s→站着[静态]的学科→统计
stat站,立+ure表名词→站着的状态→身高,身材
stat站,立+us→人立于社会的情形→地位,身份

stems_affixes.value_cn: 成文法,法令,法规;章程,规则,条例
stems_affixes.word_buile: stat站,立+ute→站着不能动→法令,法规

means.word_mean: 放弃原来信仰的人，叛教者;脱党者;反叛者

sentences.en: The most furious anarchist become the most barefaced apostate.
sentences.cn: 最激烈的无政府主义者，居然成了最露骨的变节者。
